definition: to read again/to review (a lesson etc)
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: I've read and re-read the book, but it won't go in.
sentences.chinese: 我一讀再讀這本書，但就是不得其要領。

sentences.english: He remembers that he watched the movie first, then read the book.
sentences.chinese: 他還記得自己是先看了電影之後再讀的原著。

sentences.english: Reading to a reading of detail futzing, fun.
sentences.chinese: 願一讀再讀，細細把玩，趣味無窮。

sentences.english: Youth is a book too hasty, our tears, read it again and again.
sentences.chinese: 青春是一本太倉促的書，我們含着淚，一讀再讀。
